short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Looks up online Collocation Dictionary for the selected text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*USAGE:
- Just right-click on the selected text and choose "Collocation Dictionary Lookup".
- You can also click on the extension icon to show the Collocation Dictionary popup, then look up there.

*NOTES:
After installing the extension, don't forget to pin the icon on the browser toolbar.

*UPDATES:
- [Version 0.1.2]: Moving to the website: https://www.freecollocation.com/.
- [Version 0.1.1]: Fix: moving to the development website: http://dev.ozdic.com/.
